backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a header update feature and its related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global utility applications.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing all site sections with sticky navigation and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/cta: Reusable phone-call CTA styled via utility classes with size and variant options.
Reusable WhatsApp CTA opening chat in new tab with size and variant options.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Flo: Floating WhatsApp button linking to chat with hover scaling and mobile-friendly styling.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Foo: Footer with company info, quick links, social icons, and smooth-scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Hea: Sticky responsive header with logo, navigation links, scroll behavior, mobile menu, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/sec: Renders the About section with company overview, mission, vision, and core values using styled cards.
Displays contact details and a WhatsApp-integrated contact form that sends user input via a generated WhatsApp URL.
Provides the hero banner with key services, call-to-action buttons, and a scroll-to-section function.
Shows four highlight cards summarizing major strengths like quality work and timely delivery.
Outlines the six-step workflow for construction projects using numbered cards.
Displays a grid of project cards with images, titles, and locations showcasing portfolio work.
Lists construction and renovation services with icons, titles, and brief descriptions.
Highlights reasons to choose the company using icon-based cards over a navy gradient background.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Top: Top contact bar showing phone, WhatsApp, email, and address links.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Defines social media link configuration and provides a helper to filter active links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and custom utility/component classes for a navy-themed UI.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function that merges Tailwind and conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds and opens a WhatsApp message URL using a fixed phone number and encoded text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors tied to CSS variables, extended theme settings, and added plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for building the King Kingdom construction website.
